title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer cannot access account despite multiple password resets; login still fails, needs urgent assistance to regain access.

title: Payment Failure - Card Declined
description: Customerâ€™s valid card gets declined during checkout, despite sufficient funds. Needs resolution to complete their purchase successfully.

title: Bug - Image Upload Not Working
description: Uploading JPEG and PNG images triggers a timeout error. Affects multiple users and prevents media submissions across the platform.

title: Account Locked After Failed Login
description: Account locked after three failed login attempts. User requires unlock option or support to regain access securely and quickly.

title: UI Glitch - Dashboard Widgets Missing
description: Dashboard widgets disappear randomly after reloading the page. Issue affects usability and layout consistency for users navigating the dashboard.

title: Security Alert - Suspicious Login
description: Customer noticed a login from unknown IP and foreign location. Needs investigation into potential unauthorized access or security breach.

title: Form Submission Not Responding
description: Form submit button becomes unresponsive after filling all fields. Prevents users from completing important submissions or actions on site.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
description: Customer requests dark mode option for better accessibility and reduced eye strain, especially during nighttime or extended platform usage.

title: Email Notifications Not Sent
description: Users are not receiving confirmation emails after orders. Email system appears broken and needs immediate investigation and resolution.

title: App Crash - iOS Devices
description: App crashes on iOS 15 devices when accessing profile settings. Bug disrupts user experience and requires immediate patch.

title: Localization Error - Missing Translations
description: Some UI strings remain in English when switched to Spanish. Localization is incomplete and impacts user experience for non-English users.

title: Search Not Returning Results
description: Blog keyword search returns empty results even when matching articles exist. Search functionality appears broken and needs fixing.

title: Billing Mismatch - Overcharged
description: User reports being charged twice for one subscription period. Needs refund processing and billing system audit to prevent future errors.

title: CSV Export Empty
description: Exported CSV file shows headers only with no data. Affects report generation and prevents data analysis or sharing.

title: Analytics Graph Not Loading
description: Charts on analytics page fail to load in Safari browser. Visual reporting is broken for affected users and teams.
